text: JÃ¶rgen Joakim Nilsson (born 6 February 1994) is a Swedish professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for German club Arminia Bielefeld and the Sweden national team. == Career statistics == === International === Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Sweden 2016 1 0 2017 2 0 2018 1 0 2019 0 0 2020 0 0 2021 6 0 Total 10 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Swedish footballers Category:Footballers at the 2016 Summer Olympics
